summary: This is an email chain from July 12, 2019, discussing upcoming events, including a bail hearing for Jeffrey Epstein scheduled for Monday, July 15, 2019, at 10am before Judge Berman. The email originates from the Chief of the Criminal Division at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Laura
persons.context: Sends the initial email requesting updates for the upcoming week's events to an unspecified group of recipients.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Is the subject of a bail hearing mentioned in the email chain.

persons.name: Judge Berman
persons.context: Is identified as the judge presiding over Jeffrey Epstein's bail hearing.

connections.description: Judge Berman is presiding over Epstein's bail hearing.

events.title: Epstein Bail Hearing
events.description: A bail hearing for Jeffrey Epstein is scheduled for 10am before Judge Berman.

keyFacts: A bail hearing for Jeffrey Epstein was scheduled for Monday, July 15, 2019, at 10am.
The hearing was to be held before Judge Berman.
The email originates from the Chief of the Criminal Division at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, indicating official legal proceedings.
The email is dated July 12, 2019, shortly before Epstein's death in August 2019.
